# predict.garden — Gardening & Plants Prediction Markets

> Real-time prediction markets for gardening & plants. Bet on outcomes, see live odds, and win. Free to play with shared pools powered by Firebase.


predict.garden is a prediction market platform focused on gardening & plants. Users can bet YES or NO on curated markets with real-time shared pools. Features live odds, countdown timers, trending markets, and social sharing. Part of the Predict Network — 18 niche prediction market sites.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Gardening & Plants prediction markets with live odds](https://predict.garden)
- [Markets — Active gardening & plants prediction markets](https://predict.garden#markets)


## Keywords

prediction market, gardening & plants, betting, odds, forecast, predict.garden
